title: Love Don’t Cost A Thing
lyrics:
[intro]  (Am)  (Em)
 
[chorus]
(Am) You think you gotta keep me iced you don't
You think I'm gonna spend your cash I (Em)won't
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
Think I wanna drive your Benz I don't
If I wanna floss I got my (Em)own
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
 
(Am) When you rolled up in the Escalade
Saw that truck you gave to the valet
(Em) Knew that it was game when you looked at me
Pulling up your sleeve so I could see the Rolley bling
(Am) Saw you later in the corner booth
Raising up a toast so I would notice you
(Em) But your heart's a mess
Think you outta know
Doesn't matter if you're balling out of con(Am)trol
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am) All that matter's is… That you treat me right
(Em)Give me all the things I need... That money can't buy yeah
 
[chorus]
(Am) You think you gotta keep me iced you don't
You think I'm gonna spend your cash I (Em)won't
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
Think I wanna drive your Benz I don't
If I wanna floss I got my (Em)own
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
 
(Am) When I took a chance
Thought you'd understand
Baby credit cards aren't romance
(Em) So you're tryna buy what's already yours
What I need from is not available in stores
(Am) Seen a side of you that I really feel
Doing way too much, never keep it real
(Em) If it doesn't change, gotta hit the road
Now I'm leaving, where's my keys? I've got to (Am)go
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am) All that matter's is… That you treat me right
(Em)Give me all the things I need... That money can't buy yeah
 
[chorus]
(Am) You think you gotta keep me iced you don't
You think I'm gonna spend your cash I (Em)won't
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
Think I wanna drive your Benz I don't
If I wanna floss I got my (Em)own
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am-stop)thing, a thing, a thing, a thing
 
[bridge]
You (Am)think the money that you make
Can substitute the time you take
(Em)Take the keys here to my heart
Then you can win my heart, and get what's in my heart
I (Am)think you need to take some time
To show me that your love is true
There's (Em)more than dollar signs in you
Then you can win my heart, and get what's in my heart
 
[chorus]
(Am) You think you gotta keep me iced you don't
You think I'm gonna spend your cash I (Em)won't
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
Think I wanna drive your Benz I don't
If I wanna floss I got my (Em)own
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
 
[chorus again!]
(Am) You think you gotta keep me iced you don't
You think I'm gonna spend your cash I (Em)won't
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am)thing
Think I wanna drive your Benz I don't
If I wanna floss I got my (Em)own
Even if you were broke… My love don't cost a (Am-single strum)thing [end]
